content.subject: merlin radio image
content.description: The MERLIN Imager extracts images from calibrated radio interferometry data, where available.

parameterDefinition.name: Ftol
parameterDefinition.description: Frequency tolerance (MHz) e.g. 100 Default = all available frequencies.

parameterDefinition.name: Equinox
parameterDefinition.description: Equinox - J for J2000 or B for B1950, Default J All images are returned in J2000

parameterDefinition.name: Start
parameterDefinition.description: Earliest time to consider YYYYMMDD . Default = 19910101

parameterDefinition.name: Image Size
parameterDefinition.description: Image size (arcsec). Will be rounded if necessary to ranges approx. 20-368 arcsec at 1370-1730 MHz or 5-98 arcsec at 4500-7000 MHz Default = smallest available size.

parameterDefinition.name: output type
parameterDefinition.description: This can be one of HTML VOTable or Ascii, with the default being VOTable

parameterDefinition.name: Dec
parameterDefinition.description: RA and Dec. in sexagesimal (colon-separated) or in decimal degrees e.g. +28:38:01.05 or +28.633625 If blank, MERLIN Name will be used.

parameterDefinition.name: MERLIN Images List
parameterDefinition.description: Name for VOTable which will contain image URLs

parameterDefinition.name: End
parameterDefinition.description: Latest time to consider YYYYMMDD . Default = 20201212

parameterDefinition.name: MERLIN name
parameterDefinition.description: Exact MERLIN source name (if unsure use position instead).

parameterDefinition.name: Resolution
parameterDefinition.description: Resolution (arcsec). Will be rounded if necessary to within ranges approx. 0.11-2.4 arcsec at 1370-1730 MHz or 0.03-0.72 arcsec at 4500-7000 MHz Default = natural resolution.

parameterDefinition.name: RA
parameterDefinition.description: RA in sexagesimal (colon-separated) or in decimal degrees e.g. 23:55:03.382 or 358.764092 If blank, MERLIN Name will be used.

parameterDefinition.name: Frequency
parameterDefinition.description: Frequency (MHz) e.g. 4994 Must be in ranges 1370-1430, 1550-1730, 4500-5200 or 6000-7000 MHz. Default = all available frequencies.
